root.name: Mine Bombers
root.description: Â Mine Bombers is a mixture of Bomberman and Boulder Dash in which 2-4 players mine for gold and diamonds while trying to kill each other. It was released for DOS and came with a level editor. The game starts with a small amount of money and you get more by collecting treasures found in the mine and killing other players. Money is used between levels to buy bigger and badder explosives (like nuclear bombs and C-4) and better tools for mining.
